lifelink
Whenever one or more other creatures you control die, you may return target creature card with mana value 1 or less from your graveyard to your hand.
Whenever this creature or another creature you control dies, you gain 1 life.
Whenever a creature you control dies, if it had counters on it, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.
At the beginning of your end step, if three or more creature cards were put into your graveyard from anywhere this turn, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.
Whenever this creature enters the battlefield from your graveyard, put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature you control.
Whenever a creature card leaves your graveyard, you gain 1 life and scry 1.
Whenever one or more creature cards are put into your graveyard from your library, you may put target creature card with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard on top of your library.
At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you have exactly four creature cards in your graveyard, creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token.
Whenever this creature dies, you may exile it from your graveyard. If you do, return another target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.
Whenever a creature you control leaves your graveyard, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature and you gain 1 life.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you gained 4 or more life last turn, return up to one target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
Whenever a creature you control with mana value 2 or less dies, you may pay {1}{W}. If you do, return that card to the battlefield tapped.
Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, if you control a Spirit, you may return target Aura card from your graveyard to your hand.

When this creature dies, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with "When this creature enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card with mana value 1 or less from your graveyard to your hand."
Whenever this creature attacks, if you have fewer creatures on the battlefield than creature cards in your graveyard, creatures you control gain lifelink until end of turn.

ward {X}
Whenever one or more cards are put into your graveyard from your library, this creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
Whenever you cast a spell from your graveyard, draw a card, then discard a card.
At the beginning of your end step, if you put three or more cards into your graveyard from your library this turn, you may return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
Whenever a creature you control dies, surveil 1.
Whenever an instant or sorcery card leaves your graveyard, this creature gains flying until end of turn and you get "You may look at the top card of your library any time" until your next turn.
Whenever you mill one or more creature cards, you may tap target creature an opponent controls. It doesn’t untap during its controller’s next untap step.
Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, mill three cards, then you may return target nonland card from your graveyard to your hand with mana value 2 or less.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if there are seven or more cards in your graveyard, scry 2.
Whenever a card would be put into your graveyard from anywhere, you may exile it instead. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.
Whenever one or more cards are exiled from your graveyard, you may have target creature an opponent controls get -2/-0 until your next turn.
Whenever a card leaves your graveyard, you may pay {U}. If you do, draw a card, then discard a card.
Whenever a creature card is put into your graveyard from anywhere, you may pay {1}. If you do, return target instant or sorcery card with mana value 1 from your graveyard to your hand.
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, if you have at least four card types among cards in your graveyard, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.
Whenever this creature enters the battlefield from your graveyard, look at the top three cards of your library, put one into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
Whenever you shuffle one or more cards from your graveyard into your library, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature and it gains hexproof until end of turn.
B: deathtouch
menace
Whenever this creature or another creature you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
Whenever one or more creature cards are put into your graveyard from your library, you may return target creature card with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard to your hand.
At the beginning of your end step, if a creature died this turn, you may mill two cards.
Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, you may exile that card. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.
Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player mills three cards and you may return a card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to your hand.
Whenever you sacrifice another creature, each opponent loses 1 life, you gain 1 life, and you may mill a card.
Whenever one or more cards are exiled from any graveyard, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. If you do, you lose life equal to its mana value.
Whenever this creature dies, you may pay {1}{B}. If you do, return it to the battlefield tapped under your control.
Whenever a creature you control dies, if it wasn’t a token, you may create a tapped token that’s a copy of it except it’s a 2/2 black Zombie in addition to its other types.
Whenever you discard a creature card, you may pay {B}. If you do, return that card from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped at the beginning of the next end step.
Whenever an opponent discards a card, you may exile that card from their graveyard. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature and you gain 1 life.
Whenever a creature card would leave your graveyard, you may have target opponent lose 1 life.

Whenever an opponent’s creature dies, if there are at least five creature cards in their graveyard, you may return target creature card from that player’s graveyard to the battlefield under your control.
At the beginning of each end step, if two or more creatures died this turn, create a tapped 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
Whenever this creature enters the battlefield or attacks, you may sacrifice another creature. If you do, each opponent loses 2 life and you mill two cards.
Whenever this creature enters the battlefield from your graveyard, destroy target creature with mana value less than or equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard.
Whenever you gain life from a creature dying, draw a card and then discard a card.
R: haste
first strike
Whenever another creature you control dies, this creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
Whenever a creature you control dies, you may deal 1 damage to any target.
Whenever this creature dies, exile the top two cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards.
Whenever one or more creature cards are put into your graveyard from your hand or library, this creature deals 1 damage to each opponent.
Whenever you cast a spell from your graveyard, this creature gets +2/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.
At the beginning of your combat step, if there are three or more instant and sorcery cards in your graveyard, this creature gets +2/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.
Whenever a noncreature spell you control is put into a graveyard from the stack, you may exile it. If you do, this creature deals 1 damage to any target.
Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, if it was dealt damage by a source you controlled this turn, create a Treasure token.
Whenever you discard a card, this creature deals 1 damage to any target. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.
Whenever this creature enters the battlefield from your graveyard, add {R}{R}. Until end of turn, you don’t lose this mana as steps and phases end.
Whenever a land card is put into your graveyard from anywhere, this creature deals 1 damage to each opponent.
Whenever you exile a card from your graveyard, this creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn. If that card was an instant or sorcery, it also gains menace until end of turn.

Whenever this creature attacks, you may sacrifice another creature. If you do, this creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the sacrificed creature’s power, and that creature’s owner draws a card.
Whenever a creature you control with power 4 or greater dies, you may return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
G: trample
reach
Whenever another nontoken creature you control dies, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
Whenever a creature card is put into your graveyard from anywhere, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.
At the beginning of your end step, if you have four or more creature cards in your graveyard, create a 2/2 green Beast creature token.
Whenever you sacrifice a creature, you gain 2 life.
Whenever this creature attacks, you may mill three cards. You may put a creature card from among them into your hand.
Whenever a land card is put into your graveyard from anywhere, you may return another target land card from your graveyard to your hand.
Whenever a creature enters the battlefield from your graveyard, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
Whenever one or more creature cards leave your graveyard, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. If that card has mana value 6 or greater, you may put it onto the battlefield instead.
Whenever a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it dies, you may distribute that many +1/+1 counters among up to two target creatures you control.
Whenever a creature card is put into your graveyard from your library, you may exile it. If you do, create a tapped 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

Whenever this creature dies, you may search your library for a creature card with mana value less than or equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
Whenever you cast a creature spell from your graveyard, draw a card.
Whenever a token creature you control dies, you may put a +1/+1 counter on this creature and you gain 1 life.
C: Whenever a card is put into a graveyard from anywhere, you may pay {1}. If you do, exile that card and put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.
Whenever one or more creature cards are exiled from your graveyard, create a 1/1 colorless Spirit creature token.
Whenever you exile a card from any graveyard, scry 1.
Whenever a card leaves a graveyard, this creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
Whenever this creature dies, you may exile it. If you do, exile all other creature cards from your graveyard and create a 5/5 colorless Avatar creature token with trample.
Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, if there are ten or more cards in your graveyard, return that card to the battlefield tapped.
Whenever a card would be put into your graveyard from anywhere, you may exile it instead. If you do, create a tapped Treasure token.
Whenever one or more cards are returned from your graveyard to your hand, you may put that many +1/+1 counters on this creature.
At the beginning of your end step, if at least three cards left your graveyard this turn, draw a card and create a 1/1 colorless Construct artifact creature token.
Whenever an opponent exiles a card from a graveyard, this creature deals 1 damage to that player and you gain 1 life.
Whenever this creature enters the battlefield or attacks, each player mills two cards.

Whenever there are twenty or more cards in your graveyard, this creature gets +5/+5 and has "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player exiles half their graveyard, rounded up."
